resources.string: Microphone permission needed. Please allow at App start for additional functionality.
Please join on another device. This example only works with two participants
Please join a room with another participant
AudioSink can be attached to the RemotePartipant, press the record button below to begin.
Now recording the RemoteParticipant\'s audio. Press the record button below to finish the recording
Finished recording audio. Press the play button to hear what was recorded
